QA Pre-Review of CR-094-ADD-001 v0.1 -- COMPLIANT. Recommend for approval.

Verification:

- Frontmatter revision_summary: "Initial draft" -- present
- Document structure: Sections 1-8 present per ADD template
- Placeholder content: None in pre-execution sections. Execution placeholders in Sections 5 and 7 are expected pre-approval.
- Formatting: Consistent throughout

Content review:
- Section 2 correctly identifies the gap: EI-12 VR column reads "Yes" but no VR was created. SOP-004 Section 9C.3 correctly cited.
- Section 3 accurately scopes impact as documentary only; no functional impact.
- Section 4 proposes single EI (create VR) -- appropriate scope.
- Section 6 Scope Handoff is complete: confirms all CR-094 objectives met, ADD addresses only the missing artifact.
- Section 8 references are accurate and complete (SOP-001, SOP-002, SOP-004, CR-094, CR-092-VR-001).

No deficiencies identified.
